DRY-001.name: Duplicate Code Block
DRY-001.description: Code block repeated in multiple locations (>5 lines)

SOLID-001.name: Single Responsibility Violation
SOLID-001.description: Function exceeds 50 lines, likely doing too much

DOC-001.name: Missing Documentation
DOC-001.description: Public API lacks docstring or comment

PEP8-N806.name: Variable Naming
PEP8-N806.description: Variable should be lowercase with underscores

PEP8-E402.name: Module Import Position
PEP8-E402.description: Module imports should be at top of file

GO-NAME-001.name: Receiver Name
GO-NAME-001.description: Receiver name should be 1-2 chars reflecting type

AIRBNB-VAR-001.name: Use const/let
AIRBNB-VAR-001.description: Prefer const or let over var

AIRBNB-TEMPLATE-001.name: Template Literals
AIRBNB-TEMPLATE-001.description: Use template literals instead of concatenation

TS-TYPE-001.name: Explicit Return Type
TS-TYPE-001.description: Public functions should have explicit return types

TS-ANY-001.name: Avoid Any
TS-ANY-001.description: Avoid using 'any' type; use specific types

KT-PROP-001.name: Property Declaration
KT-PROP-001.description: Prefer val over var when possible

KT-LAMBDA-001.name: Lambda Syntax
KT-LAMBDA-001.description: Use trailing lambda syntax when possible

RUST-ERROR-001.name: Error Type
RUST-ERROR-001.description: Use Result<T, E> for fallible operations

SHELL-QUOTE-001.name: Variable Quoting
SHELL-QUOTE-001.description: Quote variables to prevent word splitting

SHELL-FUNC-001.name: Function Naming
SHELL-FUNC-001.description: Use lowercase with underscores for function names
